alert.note: Alert for Coconino; Yavapai (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued March 21 at 9:24AM MST until March 22 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Flagstaff has issued a Flood Advisory for the following rivers in Arizona... Oak Creek near Sedona affecting Coconino and Yavapai Counties. .Rain with periods of heavy rain will combine with runoff from snowmelt to enhance flows in waterways. Oak Creek water levels are increasing quickly and could reach critical levels. It is currently approaching action stage and will surpass this stage shortly. For the Oak Creek...including Sedona, Cornville...elevated river levels are forecast. ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO LATE TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by rain and snowmelt is expected. * WHERE...Oak Creek near Sedona. * WHEN...From this morning to late Wednesday evening. * IMPACTS...At 5.0 feet, Multiple private low water crossings and bridges over Oak Creek above Sedona become impassable. At 7.0 feet, Likely to cause minor flooding downstream in Page Springs area near stream gage OACA3 4 to 6 hours later. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:01 AM MST Tuesday the stage was 6.9 feet. - Forecast...The creek is forecast to rise to 9.3 feet late this evening. It is forecast to rise to 9.8 feet late Wednesday morning. - Action stage is 7.0 feet. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. - Visit www.weather.gov/safety/flood for more information on flood safety. && Fld Observed Forecasts (9 am MST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Wed Thu Fri Oak Creek Sedona 14.0 6.9 Tue 9 am MST 9.8 5.4 4.4 &&
info.instruction: If you encounter a flooded roadway, turn around and find an alternative route. If you are in the advisory area, remain alert to possible flooding or the possibility of the advisory being upgraded to a warning. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at: http://ahps2.wrh.noaa.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=fgz The next statement will be issued no later than this evening at 1100 PM MST.
